scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w client"
scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w client && npm run build -w server
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w server && npm run lint -w client
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w shared && npm run typecheck -w server && npm run typecheck -w client
